hero.defaultDescription: Direct, sustainable intervention for Malaysia's underserved. Join a movement that turns compassion into tangible change.

about.heroDescription: We are a newly established foundation with a bold vision. We are a movement of dedicated professionals, partners, and volunteers committed to engineering long-term solutions for Malaysia's most pressing social challenges.

q1.title: The Foundation
q1.description: Officially established Yayasan Insan Prihatin to address systemic community needs.

q2.title: First Initiative
q2.description: Launched our pilot education support program for underprivileged students.

q3.title: Community Outreach
q3.description: Expanded operations to include healthcare access in rural areas.

q4.title: Looking Ahead
q4.description: Planning nationwide expansion of our digital literacy programs.

leadership.title: Leadership & Governance
leadership.subtitle: The Stewards
leadership.description: Guided by principles of integrity and excellence, our leadership ensures every resource is maximized for community benefit.

reports.title: Accountability in Action
reports.subtitle: Radical Transparency
reports.description: Trust is our most valuable currency. We commit to publishing annual audits and impact reports to ensure every stakeholder knows exactly how their contributions are transforming lives.

cta.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta.description: Join us in our mission to create lasting positive change for communities across Malaysia.

projects.heroDescription: Discover our initiatives making a real difference in communities across Malaysia.

blog.heroDescription: Read about our journey, success stories, and the latest updates from our community.

contact.heroDescription: Have questions or want to get involved? We'd love to hear from you.

form.name: Your Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
form.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.

donate.heroDescription: Every contribution, no matter the size, makes a meaningful difference in someone's life.

success.title: Thank You!
success.description: Your donation has been received successfully. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.

failed.title: Donation Failed
failed.description: We're sorry, but your donation could not be processed. Please try again.

footer.tagline: Empowering communities through compassion and sustainable development.

cta.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta.description: Join our community of changemakers and help create lasting impact for those who need it most.

solution.title: Our Approach
solution.description: We believe in sustainable solutions that address root causes, not just symptoms.

education.title: Education
education.description: Empowering through knowledge and skills development

healthcare.title: Healthcare
healthcare.description: Ensuring access to essential medical services

metadata.siteDescription: A prestigious Malaysian foundation dedicated to community service, education, and sustainable development.
metadata.keywords: charity, foundation, Malaysia, community service, education, sustainable development
